column3: string

column3: 简介
column4: 任务完成简介

column3: info
column4: cinfo

column3: We need to be able to screen the movies we produce to audiences
column4: Our Cinema is ready, now let's make a film for it!

column3: In order to shoot that first movie, we'll need a Film Studio
column4: Our studio is ready! Time to get a real movie made!

column3: The first film we make will set the tone of our company. It needs to be excellent!
column4: Your crew spent countless hours creating a movie that will truly blow audiences away! Congratulations on this first success!

column3: Once a movie starts screening, it will generate continuous revenue. Have a look!
column4: Movie earnings come from being screened in various locations, as well asmerchandise, licensing fees, and so on. It's an important source of income, so make sure to collect them in time!

column3: Rock helped us out with this guest appearance, but we can't rely on him from now on. We need to build a Green Room in order to recruit more actors.
column4: Now that we have our own Green Room, we can manage many actors directly!

column3: With more actors we can cover more screenplay and types of roles, which will certainly benefit the company!
column4: That's one problem solved! I believe as we grow stronger, more and more talented actors will want to join us!

column3: Your actors are talented, but need your guidance Help them improve their abilities to make great movies!
column4: An actor's ability will greatly enhance the quality of your movies, so do not forget to upgrade them regularly!

column3: We can't just make movies in a vacuum In order to be successful, we need a deeper understanding of the market
column4: By understanding the market more clearly, we will be able to create higher earning movies and improve our reputation!

column2: Advertise at the Walk of Fame
column3: Even quality movies need good marketing! We have to be pro-active if we want to increase our exposure
column4: Starting with this one street, we can now begin to share our movie with the people of the entire city

column3: Upgrading the Marketing Department will improve our understanding of the market and allow us to make more informed decisions about our strategy
column4: Upgrading the Marketing Department will greatly improve our strategy and help promote movies!

column3: While a movie is screening, increasing buzz surrounding the movie will increase earnings!
column4: Keep increasing buzz to maximize our revenue!

column3: The first street marketing campaign was good but let's spread even more influence!
column4: Each part of town will have different reactions to different spokespersons Pay attention to their reactions to make your advertising as efficient as possible!

column3: Once we've promoted our movie in all streets of a city, we can perform a roadshow Roadshows will allow us to visit our supporters directly and establish a solid fanbase!
column4: Rome wasn't built in a day, we've still got a long path ahead of us!

column3: After a successful roadshow, we can cover this city!
column4: Cover cities to create a steady stream of new fans and earnings for our company!

column2: Appoint a brand ambassador in Los Angeles
column3: Once a city has been fully covered, you can appoint a brand ambassador to maximize earnings Every city will have different expectations though
column4: After appointing a brand ambassador, the city's earnings will increase!

column2: Select a city to do a Marketing Campaign
column3: When a movie is screening, selecting a city to push a major marketing campaign will surely increase revenue!
column4: The more you focus on advertising, the more you may earn from each city!

column3: With the first film properly marketed, we can now turn our focus towards the next step
column4: Keep making great movies and success is sure to follow!

column3: An advertising department will help us get our 15 minutes of fame
column4: An advertising department will get our movies the attention they need to be successful!

column2: Increase movie buzz a total of six times
column3: Buzz can never be too high Let's keep increasing it
column4: A movie with enough buzz will etch itself into people's minds and become part of pop culture!

column3: Don't forget to collect your earnings from screening movies!
column4: After all the effort we put on increasing movie buzz, we can now collect the earnings!

column3: Let's pay a visit to our ambassadors and see how they're doing!
column4: Don't forget to check in with your ambassadors to collect city earnings!

column3: All our filming equipment is starting to clutter the studio We should build a depot to store all that extra stuff
column4: Storing extra equipment in the depot will greatly increase efficiency!

column3: Creating merchandise based on our movies could be a huge source of revenue!
column4: Selling merchandise will lead to great revenue in the long run Don't forget!

column3: Merchandise can't move itself A sales department is needed to increase sales!
column4: The sales department will do the heavy work for you and move lots of merchandise!

column3: Upgrading the Film Studio will make our movies even better!
column4: This upgrade will make our movies much better!

column3: Merchandise sales are going through the roof! But we need to increase production line efficiency
column4: Managing our production lines more efficiently will allow us to get more merchandise made!

column3: Now that we have more actors, let's not forget to keep upgrading their abilities! We need them to keep improving in order to produce great movies!
column4: Keep our actors well trained and they will give you excellent performances during film shoots!

column3: You're starting to get real good at producing movies Let's keep this hot streak going!
column4: No matter how many movies we make, make sure they are worth the audience's time and our effort! Quality over quantity!

column3: The Movie Association will put out daily leaderboards of current box office leaders Let's have a look at our rank!
column4: The leaderboard will give us a good idea of our overall progress Let's keep climbing the rankings!

column3: Completing orders ensures that  customers receive the items we produced and will boost income!
column4: Complete orders to increase our company's influence, win new fans, and earn plenty of money!

column3: This time we're coming to the big apple! If we can make it here, we can make it anywhere!
column4: That's the second city we covered! Let's make our company known around the entire country!

column2: Appoint 3 brand ambassadors in New York
column3: One ambassador might not be enough for a big city like New York Let's assign more actors here!
column4: Our ambassadors will spread the word around this city You can relax now!

column3: We've been working on the go all this time, but it's about time we got ourselves an office
column4: An office will give our company the prestige it needs

column3: Adminatrative issues always crop up no matter how well we plan Try to get them sorted as quickly as possible!
column4: Take care of these adminstration hickups before they become a real thron in our side!

column3: Let's make sure we collect all our city earnings Our New York ambassadors should have been quite profitable by now
column4: Thanks to our ambassadors, we earned way more from this covered city!

column3: Our movies keep driving our merchandise sales
column4: Keeping production lines running at full speed will increase our ability to complete orders Remember to always check in on your production workflow!

column3: Now that we are starting to gain some fans, we should build a reception room to welcome those who visit our office!
column4: Allowing our fans to visit us in person will improve our reputation and let us connect directly with our fans

column3: We've already got several fans awaiting in our reception room Let's greet them now!
column4: Fans will become quite loyal if they get to meet their favorite actors Use this to your advantage!
